TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit EndRequestBody extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: This struct contains the body data for an EndRequest record.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 appStatus, valuetype Mono.FastCgi.ProtocolStatus protocolStatus) cil managed

param.name: appStatus
param.para: A containing the application status the request ended with.
This is the same value as would be returned by a program on termination. On successful termination, this would be zero.

Docs.param: A containing the FastCGI protocol status with which the request is being ended.
Docs.summary: Constructs and initializes a new instance of with a specified application status and protocol status.

Docs.summary: Gets the data contained in the current instance.
Docs.returns: A containing the data contained in the current instance.
